Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
Acting on claims that date back over seven centuries, the [[DM.Factions[faction_Liao],Capellan Confederation]] invaded the [[DM.Factions[faction_Davion],Federated Suns]] world of [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Redfield],Redfield]] and is currently occupying it.  Elements of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCCAFStIvesLancers],1st St Ives Lancers]] and [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMercBigMAC],McCarron's Armored Cavalry]] were among the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLiaoCCAF],CCAF]] units involved in the invasion.  The [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDavionAFFS],AFFS]] has been slow to respond to this incursion.  Reports of a new Capellan BattleMech seen in the engagement appear to be nothing more than some sort of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreFrankenMech],FrankenMech]] amalgamation they are calling the [[DM.MechDefs[mechdef_cataphract_CTF-1X],Cataphract]] rather than a truly new design.



There have also been reports of a new [[DM.MechDefs[mechdef_urbanmech_UM-R60X],UrbanMech]] refit in the service of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHouseLiao],House Liao]], which adds further anti-personnel capabilities with a machine gun by downgrading the sanctioned number of heat sinks.



Meanwhile the [[DM.Factions[faction_Steiner],Lyran Commonwealth]] continues to gear up for war with [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCorpCyclopsInc],Cyclops Inc.'s]] new Hover Tank, the [[DM.VehicleDefs[vehicledef_DRILLSON].Description,Drillson]].  With its primary armaments of a [[DM.WeaponDefs[Weapon_Laser_LargeLaser_0-STOCK],Large Laser]] and [[DM.WeaponDefs[Weapon_LRM_LRM10_0-STOCK],LRM-10]] can cause a considerable amount of damage at range.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: ComStar Publishing is proud to announce their latest effort to keep the light of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreInnerSphere],Inner Sphere]] burning bright with the release of Technical Readout: 3025. This Compendious Tome lists the capabilities and history of the most common pieces of military hardware used by the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSuccessorState],Successor States]]. While our primary focus is on [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBattleMech],BattleMechs]], we have included chapters on [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCombatVehicle],Combat Vehicles]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAerospaceFighter],Aerospace fighters]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDropShip],DropShips]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreJumpShip],JumpShips]] and even the pinnacle of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreStarLeague],Star League]] technology, the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLAM],Land-Air 'Mech]]. All accompanied by brilliant illustrations, this volume is a must for all, from historians to MechWarriors. Copies can be purchased at reputable booksellers or digitally downloaded via ComNet. This has been the CNB June broadcast.
